thread.title: Gordon Ramsay Is Reviewing People's Cooking Attempts On Twitter And He's Being Harsh AF
thread.title_full: Gordon Ramsay Is Reviewing People's Cooking Attempts On Twitter And He's Being Harsh AF

author: Brogan Driscoll
title: Gordon Ramsay Is Reviewing People's Cooking Attempts On Twitter And He's Being Harsh AF
text:
Gordon Ramsay Is Reviewing People's Cooking Attempts On Twitter And He's Being Harsh AF Ouch. 20/02/2017 11:32 | Updated 22 minutes ago Brogan Driscoll Lifestyle Editor of The Huffington Post UK 
Everyone’s favourite foul-mouthed chef Gordon Ramsay is reviewing people’s meals on Twitter and let’s just say he isn’t holding back. 
The multi-Michelin starred chef is known for his brutal take downs and pithy one-liners, reaching global notoriety with TV shows such as ‘Hell’s Kitchen’ and ‘The F Word’. 
Now, he’s got his sights set on the culinary exploits of people on Twitter, and no one is safe from the firing line. 
Here are just a handful of the harsh (but always hilarious) reviews of people’s cooking attempts. @GordonRamsay i made mushroom omelettes, first try, how's it look pic.twitter.com/s7a0h71A3I
